Detailed Description

Equivalent of state_idx for spIdxs.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ebl::state_spidx::state_spidx (  ) 

Constructs a state_spidx with nothing in it, since there is no order 0 for spidx do not use it, apart for derived classes

)

this appends the state_spidx into the parameter passed as argument. This is useful for allocating multiple state_idx inside a parameter.
